titles.title: A joint resolution making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: 12/22/1987--Introduced. Makes continuing appropriations for FY 1988. Provides that the operations of the Government shall continue in the manner in existence prior to the Attorney General's opinion issued on April 25, 1980, and that the sanctions of the Anti-Deficiency Act which may occur as the result of such operations are suspended.
